Package ar.edu.utn.frc.tup.lc.iv.services.interfaces.billExpense

Interface IBillExpenseDataService

All Known Implementing Classes:
BillExpenseDataService
public interface IBillExpenseDataService
Service class for managing data necessary for BillRecord Service.

  • Method Details

    • getBillRecord

      BillRecordModel getBillRecord(PeriodDto periodDto)
      Retrieves a bill record for a given period.
      Parameters:
      periodDto - the period for which to retrieve the bill record
      Returns:
      the bill record for the specified period

    • existBillRecordInPeriod

      boolean existBillRecordInPeriod(PeriodDto periodDto)
      Checks if a bill record exists for a given period.
      Parameters:
      periodDto - the period to check for an existing bill record
      Returns:
      true if a bill record exists for the specified period, false otherwise

    • constraintBillExpenseOwners

      List<BillExpenseOwnerModel> constraintBillExpenseOwners(PeriodDto periodDto, Integer createUser)
      Retrieves a list of bill expense owners constrained by a given period and user.
      Parameters:
      periodDto - the period to retrieve the bill expense owners
      createUser - the user who created the bill expense owners
      Returns:
      list of bill expense owners for the specified period and user
